entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Strathmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Strathmore 7:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 0.6°C
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 over southern sections late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:06 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
